dude {{champion:45}} was way too insane the way he was the second you got stunned you were almost dead and the cage was instant that wasnt very fair either considering alot of champs have delays only makes sense that they nerfed him
...this is a buff, look at his cooldowns and mana costs

They have largely nerfed his only form of cc and defense. Sure a few changes to cooldown and mana are good, but they don't account for the the changes to the stun.
That delay is the end of his ability to hold onto a lane against assassins.

Also, the damage reduction on his ult to compensate for the damage reduction from the removal of DFG makes no sense.

They reduced the Ult Damage because of the sheer increase of AP you can get from your Q (early game you can now quite decently get twice the CS for your Q)

Honestly the removal of DFG didn't hit Veigar that hard, cause honestly if you weren't 100-0ing them without DFG, you needed to learn how to farm.

And yeah the E nerf is the death of him, the only thing keeping any assassin from jumping him was the E, now they have no reason not to.

My thoughts on the Veigar rework.
q - Yes. All my yes. Creative positioning can reward you with 2 stacks in one shot, and that increase in range is wonderful. Plus it actual requires effort. 10/10
e - Overall, yes, because though it is kind of easy to dodge when you see it coming it can be unfair in ambushes, however I got the feeling that .75 was just a tad too long. Even when surprising, they could just casually walk out of it. I'm feeling maybe a .5 or even .4 might be enough to allow those with quick reflexes to dodge it, but still allows people to actually hit it if they place it right.

In general, love it. As fun as it is blowing idiots up that don't know how to counter Veigar, it's nice that they no longer have an excuse when they die, and even nicer that it requires honest to God effort to play him well.

Relating to "Relative Team Colors," I think the colors should be standardized to the 'North Side' always being Red and the 'South Side' always being Blue. This allows greater parity between spectating league and playing it. As an added note, players on Red Side in Champion Select should be selecting champions on the Right side of the screen instead of the Left.

I don't know why they decided to HALF Kassadin's ult range, it's pretty harsh.  If we compare this to other abilities, it shows how bad of a nerf this is:

Kassadin Riftwalk - from 700 - 450
Flash - 425
Le Blanc Distortion - 600 (1200 double distortion)
Zed Living Shadow - 550
Ahri Fox-Fire - 550
Katarina Shunpo - 700

So I've basically just used mobile mid laners as examples.  I don't know why they didn't just reduce to 600 or a figure around that.  To nerf him, they should have just made his main source of damage on his w so that he would have to get right in people's faces making it riskier to assassinate.  His Riftwalk cooldown does still make it slightly superior to the abilities above, but even at max rank full cdr, Le Blanc's Distortion is only a 6 second cooldown.

That's my little rant anyway. {{champion:38}}
